price: 9. Annaga (Allaah ah) baa soo dejinnay Waanada (Qur’aanka) Annagaana ilaalin5.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
footnotes: 5. Aayaddan waxay muujineysa meeqaanka Qur’aanka iyo xifdintiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā al-dhik'ra wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
